Text: Thank you for this. You and everyone else trying to keep avi's alive for us who need it. My computer just will not play anything else. (it's really old) Thank you again.

Thanks MP4SUX for this release. Now the bad part. The audio is, somewhat, scratchy sounding so what I did was download the MP4 version of this, which is perfect in picture and sound, and all I have to do now is a simple MP4 to AVI conversion

@ gacgirl... All you have to do is install K-Lite Mega Codec Pack  9.2.0 and your computer will be able to play anything. There are other types of codec packs out there too if this one isn't for you and they are all free.
